backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining all data types (UserProfile, Couple, planner entries, journal entries) and state maps, with authorization setup via AccessControl and MixinAuthorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping four partner-view features (yearly, monthly, weekly planner partner tabs and React Query hooks) to their target files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short summaries of each frontend source file, describing their purpose, recent fixes, and key functionality for build planning reference.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH CSS custom properties for the light and dark color themes used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell titled 'Future Us' that mounts the React app at the `#root` div via `src/main.tsx`.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component setting up TanStack Router with all page routes, a navigation bar, profile setup modal, couple mode badge, and Internet Identity login/logout controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and caches an authenticated (or anonymous) ICP backend actor, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries whenever the Internet Identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, wrapping DFINITY's AuthClient to expose login, logout, and identity state with status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks (queries and mutations) for all backend actor calls, covering user profiles, couples, vision board entries, daily planner entries, and journal entries.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports fonts, configures Tailwind, and defines CSS custom properties for a warm cream/amber light theme and a dark theme, plus a few shared component utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/CoupleSettings.tsx: Page component for managing couple connections, allowing users to copy their Principal ID, link a partner by their Principal, and view or disconnect an existing couple relationship.
frontend/src/pages/DailyPlanner.tsx: Page component for a day-by-day planner where users can log schedule items, tasks, mood, water intake, gratitude entries, and a journal entry, with navigation between dates.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page that displays a daily inspirational quote, weekly task progress, vision board goal summaries, and quick-navigation cards to other app sections.
frontend/src/pages/JournalSection.tsx: Provides a tabbed journaling interface with four journal types (daily, emotional, night reflection, growth), each supporting date navigation and CRUD operations via React Query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/MonthlyPlanner.tsx: Renders a monthly planner with editable goals, tasks, important dates, budget, mood, and notes for the current user, plus a read-only view of the partner's monthly entry.
frontend/src/pages/VisionBoard.tsx: Displays a vision board of categorized long-term goals with progress tracking, and supports adding, updating progress, and deleting entries via modals, with a partner read-only view.
frontend/src/pages/WeeklyPlanner.tsx: Implements a weekly planner with ISO-week navigation, allowing the user to manage priorities, tasks, habits, and energy levels, while showing a read-only view of the partner's weekly entry.
frontend/src/pages/YearlyPlanner.tsx: Provides a yearly planner with year navigation for setting a word of the year, major goals, vision images, and a monthly habit tracker, alongside a read-only partner view.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom fonts, OKLCH-based color tokens (warm palette, sidebar, charts), border radii, and box shadows, plus typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file listing existing implemented features (partner-view tabs for yearly, monthly, and weekly planners plus React Query hooks) and two pending tasks (daily planner partner view and backend partner query endpoints).
